name: sise3
description: Sistema Integral de Seguimiento de Expedientes
author: Consejo de la Judicatura Federal

scripts.dev: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=dev && quasar dev -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=dev  && quasar dev -m pwa)
scripts.qa: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=qa && quasar dev -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=qa  && quasar dev -m pwa)
scripts.local: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=local && quasar dev -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=local  && quasar dev -m pwa)
scripts.prd: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=prd && quasar dev -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=prd  && quasar dev -m pwa)
scripts.build:dev: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=dev && quasar build -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=dev  && quasar build -m pwa)
scripts.build:qa: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=qa && quasar build -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=qa  && quasar build -m pwa)
scripts.build:prd: if-env OS=Windows_NT && (set ENV_FILE=prd && quasar build -m pwa) || (export ENV_FILE=prd  && quasar build -m pwa)
